extraction.instruction: Extract key financial and covenant terms from this agreement and answer the questions.
highlights: The interest rate will be Term SOFR plus applicable margin.
- Minimum Interest Coverage Ratio of 3.00 to 1.00
Events of Default include payment default, bankruptcy default, and covenant default.
